question:
How to make Lemon slushies at home.

Choices:
A: Use Ice tray to freeze Lemonade.  Use from carton at grocery stores.  When lemon (Ice) is frozen, place ice cubes in a blender. Mix on low at first then raise speed. Add 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice with 1/4 cup sugar. When blended serve in a dish.
B: Use Ice tray to freeze Lemonade.  Use from carton at grocery stores.  When lemon (Ice) is frozen, place ice cubes in a blender. Mix on low at first then raise speed. Add 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice with 1/4 cup salt. When blended serve in a dish.
steps: To make Lemon slushies at home, start with lemonade, which can be store-bought. Freeze the lemonade in an ice tray to form lemon-flavored ice cubes.
Once the lemonade ice cubes are frozen, place them in a blender. Start blending on a low speed to break the ice cubes down, then gradually increase the speed to achieve a smoother consistency.
After the ice is sufficiently crushed, you need to add flavoring. Adding 1/2 cup of fresh lemon juice will enhance the lemon flavor of the slushie.
Adding sugar is important to balance the tartness of the lemon juice and make the slushie sweet and palatable. Hence, 1/4 cup of sugar is added.
Option A specifies adding sugar, which is a common ingredient in sweet beverages, while Option B incorrectly suggests adding salt, which would negatively affect the taste of a sweet lemon slushie.

Therefore, the correct answer is A: Use Ice tray to freeze Lemonade. Use from carton at grocery stores. When lemon (Ice) is frozen, place ice cubes in a blender. Mix on low at first then raise speed. Add 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice with 1/4 cup sugar. When blended serve in a dish.
